turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! What can I do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order me three medium-size pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you make the order from Bella Luna Pizzeria?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I sure can! what would you like on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you make one chicken barbecue, one veggie lover, and one meat lover's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually change that chicken barbecue to Hawaiian style.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So, can you repeat my order, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, 3 medium pizzas, One Hawaiian, one Veggie lovers and one eat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And, yes As I Can you also make it with extra cheese on all three of them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Most definitely, Extra cheese on all three.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you give me the total price and how long is it going to take me to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, the total cost is $64.88.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be ready in 35 min for pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How How long?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Sounds good. Thank you. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a great day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
